fields.headline: Pick of the week: Clubs
fields.bodyText: Air Cargo, EC2 Saturday 2 Ali B's award-winning night returns with breakbeats and electro sounds from Janette Slack, BMX fanatic Mr No Hands, Lazersonic and mellow house from Grinny Grandad. Defected In The House Ministry Of Sound, SE1 Saturday 2 Featuring encyclopaedia of beats Kenny "Dope" Gonzalez and France's Claude Monnet. They play a fusion of Latin, house, hip-hop and broken beats. DJ Krush KOKO, NW1 Sunday 3 Ex-Yakuza man DJ Krush mastered the art of turntablism and is considered one of the pioneers of Japanese hip-hop. Check out his regal skills at this live set at the old Camden Palace. The Black Cotton Club Volupte, EC4 Friday 8 Lady Kamikaze's weekly club night is a hothouse of 20s jazz, swing, rumba and 40s bebop. If you don't know your jive from your Charleston it's time to start practising. Tiesto O2 Arena, SE10 Friday 8 A five-hour trance spectacular from the dance deiety performing classics and new material from In Search Of Sunrise 7: Asia. Dark shades and glow sticks at the ready.
